Hello blank fragment 1. Always try to execute the trade as soon as possible. 2. If you are trading with multiple lots then please book 50% profit on first target for 1 lot and for other lots use trailing sl from 1st target. Again if you are trading with 1 lot. Book 1st target and exit. 3. Always trade with given levels and do not forget to put stop loss in your trade. 4. Always use SL-M order for buy above and sell below trades after activation immediate Put Stop loss and profit order. 5. Always book profit in decimals. Means buffer of 20 paisa.for example our target 9 so you can place your target order at 8.9 6. Always book profit in decimals. Means buffer of 10-20 paisa. 8. And one most important thing if i have given exit msg from any ongoing trade means immediate exit with minor loss or profit no wait for Option again going up or down. 7. We always provide sell below and buy above. Please wait for position to get activated. Use 10 paisa buffer for activation of call. Do not trade according to any level. Wait for call to get activated. 9. If you will follow above mentioned Rules its my 100% guarantee your day will be in green with the minimum 3000-4000/+ profit.
10. 10 th rule is very important. Read again.
Feedback and support : ritzzweb@gmail.com
.
